; Sync 1 atmp1 phasor 100 ; Sync 2 atmp2 phasor 150 async diff 1 - (atmp1 + atmp2)
a1 oscilikts 14000, kfrq, 1, async, 0 a2 oscilikts 14000, kfrq, 1, async, -kphs
out a1 - a2 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
